articles.title: "Doesn't Make Sense": Justin Langer Stunned By MS Dhoni's 'Unbelievable' Hero Worship While Hardik P.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Australian Justin Langer was quite taken aback by the hero worship of MS Dhoni across the country.
articles.content: The Indian Premier League (IPL) every year bring the best of cricket talents around the world in one place. This is one tournament which top names around the world do not want to miss. The high salar… [+2169 chars]
